scripts.postinstall: if [ -d "frontend" ] && [ -f "frontend/package.json" ]; then cd frontend && npm install; fi
scripts.build:frontend: if [ -d "frontend" ] && [ -f "frontend/package.json" ]; then cd frontend && npm run build; fi
scripts.start:frontend: if [ -d "frontend" ] && [ -f "frontend/package.json" ]; then cd frontend && npm start; fi
